title.rendered: Yonder Media Mobile and Horizon Fintex Launch Mobile Platform for the Exchange of NFTs Minted in User Generated Content.

content.rendered:
Now everyone can take advantage while their assets shine.

MEXICO CITY, April 12, 2022 /PRNewswire/ — Yonder Media Mobile Inc. (“YMM”), a provider of integrated mobile telecommunications and entertainment services, and Horizon Fintex (Horizon), a blockchain technology company that builds and operates digital securities markets, announced the launch of its mobile market for NFTs on an Ethereum Layer-2 blockchain within YMM’s YO Mobile platform. YO Mobile is available on iOS, Android, and the Huawei AppGallery; https://yomobile.com/nft

YO Mobile is a growing mobile experience that “enables new types of organization and human behavior“combining for the first time connectivity, Contents, Community, and Trade on a single platform.

YO Mobile was launched in Mexico in mid-2021 and has more than 1 million registered “fans”, more than 100 thousand subscribers using the “YO Mobile” telephone network and more than 330 thousand Tik Tok followers, hooked by a world-class, highly differentiated product that more than 80% of people pay for partially with YOYO$ – an ERC-20 crypto currency minted and collected on the YO blockchain. “hooked” = the average user interaction is more than 200 minutes up to date!

Starting in April 2022, YMM will launch the interconnected, tokenized, and gamified YOverse, in his optimistic view of the Ethereum Layer-2 blockchain, Adam Kidron, CEO of YMM, comments: “The full extent of our ambition, vision and madness will be revealed, as the YOverse is a mobile space of infinite realities, native to the internet, in which NFTs become objects of desire, democracy and evidence that you have participated in great events. A magical place where the more you play, the less you pay, and the more you and your community benefit.”

Brian Collins, CEO of Horizon Fintex says, “YO’s vision of a truly decentralized mobile experience, combined with an internet service layer and being one of the telecom operators in Mexico, is a true catalyst. The communities of creators in Mexico add value to the YO NFT market. They earn, spend or claim their crypto earnings and rewards, and can even buy mobile top-ups with YOYO$. This gives creators and artists on YO a space to showcase and benefit from their digital works using mobile NFT technology to build and engage with followers of their content.”

YOverse features include:

  • Zero crypto-gas fees for YOverse users when minting an NFT, collecting YOYO$ rewards, and in-app NFT/YOYO$ trading.
  • NFTs (ERC-721) minted in games, songs, videos, stored in a wallet of your YO profile within the app, exportable to OpenSea and other NFT markets compatible with ERC-721/-1155.
  • A mobile Ethereum crypto-wallet within the app, for a seamless Web3 experience without Layer-2 and Ethereum Layer-1 custody.
  • A single in-app sign-on (SSO) Web3 that enables frictionless travel, proof of attendance (PoAP), and decentralized autonomous organization (DAO).
  • Content Generation by Users (GCU) for the creation of NFTs, and auction of YOYO$ in the YOverso.
  • Issuance of rewards in Ethereum ERC-20 token (YOYO$), and NFT purchases within the app.
  • A YOYO$ Web3 decentralized finance (DeFi) exchange with attractive staking and earning Annualized Percentage Yields (APY).
  • Secure entry of YOYO$ (ERC-20) and YOverse NFT (ERC-721) Layer-1 <> Layer-2
  • GameHub and BuildABubble SDKs that encourage everyone to build experiences in the YOverse (Bubbles, which are our experience spaces, mini-apps or planets).
  • YO Mobile is the teleporter to a new, improved and hopefully more democratized world.

About Yonder Media Mobile
Yonder Media Mobile, Inc., is a Delaware corporation, (USA) founded in 2018, with a team of more than 70 brilliant creatives, developers, producers, support staff and managers, located in the US, Mexico, and Europe.

The YMM team developed YO Mobile, a super-duper app with Telco heart (“Mobile Virtual Experience Platform”) + entertainment soul combining Connectivity, Content, Community, and eCommerce-enabled blockchain in a single mobile platform for the first time.

The next step is the YOverse…you must be there!

About Horizon Fintex
Horizon Fintex is a fintech that builds and powers digital equity markets with an integrated Ethereum blockchain software suite for compatible issuance, management, and secondary trading of securities. Its in-house solutions combine Wall Street and Silicon Valley to power the next generation of security and exchange offerings in the United States and around the world. Learn more at https://horizonfintex.com/ and https://raneum.com/.
